statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_brands;
SELECT brand_name, order_date FROM fashion_brands ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT brand_id, order_id FROM fashion_brands WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_name, return_id FROM fashion_brands WHERE return_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY return_id DESC;
SELECT brand_name, shipment_date FROM fashion_brands WHERE order_id = 1001 ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_brands WHERE order_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT brand_name, order_date, return_date FROM fashion_brands WHERE shipment_id = 200 AND return_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT brand_name, shipment_date FROM fashion_brands WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY brand_name;
SELECT brand_name, shipment_date FROM fashion_brands WHERE brand_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT SUM(order_id) AS total_orders FROM fashion_brands WHERE shipment_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY brand_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM brands;
SELECT brand_name, brand_id FROM brands;
SELECT brand_id, brand_name FROM brands ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_amount > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT brand_name FROM brands WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT brand_name, SUM(order_amount) AS total_order_amount FROM brands INNER JOIN orders ON brands.brand_id = orders.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY order_amount DESC;
SELECT brand_name, AVG(order_amount) AS avg_order_amount FROM brands INNER JOIN orders ON brands.brand_id = orders.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name HAVING avg_order_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM brands;
SELECT brand_name, brand_id FROM brands;
SELECT brand_id, brand_name FROM brands ORDER BY brand_id DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, status FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM brands;
SELECT brand_id, brand_name FROM brands ORDER BY brand_name DESC;

SELECT brands.brand_name, orders.order_date, shipments.status FROM brands INNER JOIN orders ON brands.brand_id = orders.brand_id INNER JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id WHERE shipments.status = 'Shipped';
SELECT brand_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY brand_id;
SELECT brand_name, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM brands INNER JOIN orders ON brands.brand_id = orders.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name HAVING avg_amount > 1000 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_brands WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT brand_name, established_year FROM fashion_brands ORDER BY established_year DESC;
SELECT brand_name, established_year FROM fashion_brands WHERE established_year >= 2000 AND brand_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT order_id, total_price FROM orders ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT return_id, return_reason FROM returns WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fashion_brands WHERE established_year > 2010;
SELECT brand_name, established_year FROM fashion_brands ORDER BY established_year DESC;
SELECT b.brand_name, o.total_price FROM fashion_brands b JOIN orders o ON b.brand_id = o.brand_id WHERE o.total_price > 1000;
SELECT r.return_id, r.return_reason, o.order_date FROM returns r JOIN orders o ON r.order_id = o.order_id WHERE r.return_reason LIKE '%damaged%';
SELECT s.shipment_id, s.delivery_date, o.total_price FROM shipments s JOIN orders o ON s.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.total_price > 500 AND s.status = 'delivered';
SELECT * FROM fashion_brands;
SELECT brand_name, country FROM fashion_brands ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2002;
SELECT order_id, shipment_status FROM shipments WHERE ship_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fashion_brands ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT brand_name, country FROM fashion_brands WHERE country = 'Italy';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%786%';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id WHERE ship_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM fashion_brands JOIN orders ON fashion_brands.id = orders.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
